column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Overall a very good restaurant. My husband and I decided to have a lunch date here since my brother-in-law and his girlfriend are big fans of it. When we arrived to the establishment
column2: we saw numerous people waiting to be seated. However
column3: when we told the hostess that it was was just two people in our party
column4: we were seated right away. I'm guessing that the people waiting were for three or more.
